verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
This is holy ground
We're standing on holy ground
For the Lord is here
And where He is is holy
x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
These are holy hands,
We're lifting up holy hands,
For the Lord has cleansed,
And what He's cleansed is holy
x2

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
We are standing on holy ground
And we know that
there are angels all around.

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Let us praise Jesus now.
We are standing
in His presence on holy ground.
